message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
I think we should split more evenly, your share will be worth less over time.
I'll compromise, but I still think I deserve a bit more
This offer is closer to even, and accounts for the decreasing value of your share.
I'm willing to meet in the middle, but I still want a slightly bigger share
Time is running out, Alice. This is a very fair offer considering the circumstances.
